meanings.sent1: The movie's endings left the audience feeling satisfied.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the endings of books to see how the story concludes.
meanings.sent3: The endings of the play were so unexpected that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The endings of a chapter in life can sometimes lead to new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The endings of a song can leave a lasting impression on the listener.

meanings.definition: The way in which something finishes.
meanings.sent1: The endings of races are always exciting to watch.
meanings.sent2: She carefully planned the endings of her sentences to make a strong impact.
meanings.sent3: The endings of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The endings of a journey can bring a sense of accomplishment and relief.
meanings.sent5: The endings of a day can bring a sense of peace and closure.

meanings.definition: The conclusion of a story or event.
meanings.sent1: The endings of fairy tales often teach valuable lessons.
meanings.sent2: The detective worked hard to uncover the endings of the mysterious case.
meanings.sent3: The endings of the magic show left the audience in awe and wonder.
meanings.sent4: The endings of a friendship can be as impactful as the beginning.
meanings.sent5: The endings of a chapter in history can shape the future.
